subtitle: The chicken is basted in a tasty mixture of mustard, honey, garlic and lemon.

method.text: In a bowl, mix together the butter, honey, mustard, garlic, lemon rind and juice and seasoning.
Brush the baste liberally over the chicken. Cook on the barbecue, turning and basting frequently, for 20-25 min or until thoroughly cooked.

title: Spiced honeyed chicken
